Module com.example.organizer
Package com.bookclub.model

Class Review

java.lang.Object
com.bookclub.model.Review
public class Review extends Object
The Review class represents a user's review of a book. It contains the user who made the review, the book being reviewed, and the rating given to the book.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Review(User user, Book book, int rating)
    Constructs a Review object with the specified user, book, and rating.

    • setRating

      public void setRating(int rating)
      Sets a new rating for the book. The rating must be between 0 and 5, otherwise, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      rating - the new rating to be set for the book
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the rating is outside the range 0 to 5
